title: Baozou Lu A Lu season 2
title_japanese: 暴走撸啊撸 第二季
synopsis: Runaway comics, the first domestic Tucao to LOL original animation "Runaway Luah Lu" in the second season of the hot return! Comparable to the exquisite style of Japanese comics, the consistent style of baoman has no discipline and no lower limit, and the plot is compact and intensive. The animation that once made us laugh out of our abs is back! The funny trio composed of Tsundere EZ and Rurouni Yasuo is about to embark on a new journey! From the second season of July 12th, one episode will be updated every week. The funny guys from Valoran are waiting for you here! (translated from douban)
